list.abs: The children get fidgety if they have nothing to do ., 小孩子要是没事可做 , 就会变得不耐烦起来.
the research on the experiences of controlled fidgety patients ., 烦躁患者约束体验的研究.
Children fidgety and got cuffed by the adults ;, 孩子不耐烦了 , 被大人打了耳光;
...在健康小婴儿中常一过性出现一种小幅度的舞蹈样运动,称为不安宁运动,fidgety movements,在矫正年龄6周后开始出现,9-12周最显著,在14-20周减退直至消失,不安宁运动缺乏高度提示神经.

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of agitation expressed in continual motion;

sentences.sentence: "waiting gave him a feeling of restlessness"
